snippet.title: Everblade Cinematic Trailer - Upcoming Action Platformer May 2022
snippet.description:
Avenge a crumbling world in this action-packed platformer. Jump, fight, climb, and fly through worlds full of enemies, hazards, and puzzles. Discover hidden treasures and develop new skills and devastating attacks to aid in your fight against the hordes of evil. Will you succeed and restore order to the world?

PLAY THE DEMO:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1873570/Everblade/

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA:
https://twitter.com/elion_games
https://www.reddit.com/r/everblade_game
https://www.facebook.com/eliongames
https://www.instagram.com/elion_games/

(Upcoming Indie Game 2022, New Indie Game Release PC, Metroidvania 2022, Indie Gaming, New Action Platformer, Indie Platformer Game, New Indie Game Trailers)
